title: Korres 24-Hour Moisturising and Brightening Cream, Wild Rose, 1.35 Ounce
description: Moisturizing and brightening cream, with wild rose oil, a natural source of vitamin c, helps repair the look of fine lines and skin discolorations.

title: Phyto 9 Ultra Nourishing Cream for Ultra Dry Hair, 1.7-Ounce
description: Phyto 9 is a daily ultra nourishing leave-in cream rich in botanicals. Nine plant ingredients soften, hydrate, nourish, balance, soothe, revitalize and strengthen hair. For dry and damaged hair.

title: CHI Enviro 54 Hair Spray Natural Hold, 12 Ounce
description: Create multiple textures with outstanding style memory. The best thing is that these styles can be regenerated with heat again and again.
